alert.note: Alert for Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 6:25PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dewey County through 715 PM MDT... At 625 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lantry, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lantry around 630 PM MDT. Bear Creek around 635 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Green Grass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
